edu.rice.starvote.drivers

Interface IPWMDriver

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PWMBlaster, PWMPython

    public interface IPWMDriver

    Interface for a pulse width modulation (PWM) controller.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void setDutyCycle(double dutyCycle)
      Set the PWM duty cycle.
      void setFrequency(double frequency)
      Set the PWM base frequency.

    • Method Detail

      • setFrequency

        void setFrequency(double frequency)
           throws java.io.IOException

        Set the PWM base frequency.

        Parameters:
        frequency - Frequency in hertz.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If an error occurs when communicating with the device driver.

      • setDutyCycle

        void setDutyCycle(double dutyCycle)
           throws java.io.IOException

        Set the PWM duty cycle.

        Parameters:
        dutyCycle - Value in range [0.0, 100.0], where 0 is full-low and 100 is full-high.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If an error occurs when communicating with the device driver.
